20110120170857.000|20110120170859.000|CC1|>> WE SAW TENSION HEADACHES, BUT
20110120170859.000|20110120170901.000|CC1|IT'S NOT BECAUSE YOU'RE TENSE.

20110120170904.000|20110120170906.000|CC1|BARTS OF YOUR BRAIN GET FLOODED 
20110120170906.000|20110120170907.000|CC1|WITH TOO MUCH BLOOD.

20110120171002.000|20110120171003.000|CC1|EMERGENCY ROOM?                 
20110120171003.000|20110120171005.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT IN A BIG BELIEVER IN
